channel.title: International Expansion on FinanClub

item.title: HOOD
item.description: score:-6 Chances: Shares of Robinhood Markets, Inc. (HOOD) surged due to better-than-expected trading volumes in February. The company reported an increase in trading volumes across all asset classes compared to January 2024. Robinhood’s Assets Under Custody (AUC) rose to $118.7 billion, representing a 16% month-on-month increase.
